New Records: Mohammad Rizwan became the joint-fastest to 2000 runs in T20Is
Key Match Events: Pakistan scored 158 for 7 after being put in to bat first
England won the match to take a 1-0 lead in the 7-match series
Babar and Rizwan put on 85 runs for the opening wicket
Harry Brook hit a four through the cover region to take the Three Lions home
Pre-Game Insights: Babar Azam emphasized the need for Pakistan batters to step up and chip in with consistent performances
Post-Match Reflections: Babar Azam mentioned that the Pakistan batters failed to stitch together enough partnerships
Miscellaneous Highlights: England made a stupendous comeback after being asked to chase down 159
Others: Rizwan scored 68 runs off 46 balls with six fours and one six
